医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
达菲缺失表型可能导致癌症药物试验被不公平地排除达纳法伯癌症研究所和伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员在一份报告中报告说，许多新抗癌药物的临床试验可能不适当地排除了一些具有“达菲无效表型”的人，这种特征主要存在于非洲或中东血统的人中。新的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Duffy-null-phenotype-may-lead-to-unfair-exclusion-from-cancer-drug-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Duffy-null-phenotype-may-lead-to-unfair-exclusion-from-cancer-drug-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7858a331-5016-404b-ba8d-7455ac2ab6bf Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:52:17 -0400 Duffy-null phenotype may lead to unfair exclusion from cancer drug trials
人工智能工具通过转换标准组织图像来增强癌症诊断VirtualMultiplexer 将组织学图像转化为详细的癌症标记物，通过人工智能创新简化诊断并提高患者治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/AI-tool-enhances-cancer-diagnosis-by-transforming-standard-tissue-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/AI-tool-enhances-cancer-diagnosis-by-transforming-standard-tissue-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138994c0-50eb-4c8f-ac91-37a8bd639a98 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:09:00 -0400 AI tool enhances cancer diagnosis by transforming standard tissue images
更短的白细胞端粒长度和更大的 LTL 损耗与囊性纤维化的严重程度相关2024年8月29日，一篇新的研究论文发表在Aging（被MEDLINE/PubMed列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和Web of Science的“Aging-US”）第16卷第16期，题为“白细胞端粒”长度和磨损与囊性纤维化患者的疾病严重程度相关。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Shorter-leukcyto-telomere-length-and-greater-LTL-attrition-tied-to-cystic-fibrosis-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Shorter-leukcyto-telomere-length-and-greater-LTL-attrition-tied-to-cystic-fibrosis-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9b66d01-1885-4096-9815-69a69b12de9c Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:08:03 -0400 Shorter leukocyte telomere length and greater LTL attrition tied to cystic fibrosis severity
新的 IndiPHARM 计划旨在彻底改变个性化药物管理哥伦比亚大学领导的一项名为 IndiPHARM 的多中心研究工作：用于药物优化的个体代谢组和暴露组评估将开发一个平台和监测系统，以防止药物与其他环境、遗传和生活方式因素之间不必要的相互作用，从而优化治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-IndiPHARM-initiative-aims-to-revolutionize-personalized-medication-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-IndiPHARM-initiative-aims-to-revolutionize-personalized-medication-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c89c7a05-00aa-4e5b-afcc-daff39ebcf67 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:02:46 -0400 New IndiPHARM initiative aims to revolutionize personalized medication management
在内罗毕会议上介绍非洲人群阿尔茨海默病和痴呆症的遗传学与非洲人群阿尔茨海默病和痴呆症相关的基因组区域将于 2024 年 9 月 11 日至 12 日举行的非洲痴呆症未来会议上公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Genetics-of-Alzheimers-disease-and-dementia-in-African-populations-presented-at-Nairobi-conference.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Genetics-of-Alzheimers-disease-and-dementia-in-African-populations-presented-at-Nairobi-conference.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c65bd431-bc45-427b-a356-c91199b203bb Thu, 12 Sep 2024 06:55:46 -0400 Genetics of Alzheimer's disease and dementia in African populations presented at Nairobi conference
在蒙大拿州，911 电话揭示了热浪对农村老年人的影响米苏拉是蒙大拿州最大的城市之一，但周围都是乡村山区社区，其中养牛业占主导地位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/In-Montana-911-calls-reveal-impact-of-heat-waves-on-rural-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/In-Montana-911-calls-reveal-impact-of-heat-waves-on-rural-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a82c2b79-f191-49e8-85f8-eb6b45ea64b2 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 06:35:06 -0400 In Montana, 911 calls reveal impact of heat waves on rural seniors
机器学习揭示睡眠质量和焦虑是抑郁症的主要预测因素研究人员应用机器学习来预测抑郁症状，揭示睡眠质量和焦虑是不同人群和数据集中的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Machine-learning-reveals-sleep-quality-and-anxiety-as-major-predictors-of-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Machine-learning-reveals-sleep-quality-and-anxiety-as-major-predictors-of-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df565ba7-7f51-48f4-a43a-082c9e7f8ee6 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 06:33:00 -0400 Machine learning reveals sleep quality and anxiety as major predictors of depression
研究人员揭示了为什么通常正常的蛋白质会导致前列腺癌NSD-2 对于前列腺癌中的 AR 活性至关重要，可促进肿瘤生长并为晚期前列腺癌治疗提供潜在的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Researchers-uncover-why-典型地-正常-蛋白质-驱动器-前列腺-癌症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Researchers-uncover-why-典型地-正常-蛋白质-drives-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d13f277-090b-4b2d-9a28-a029014fb308 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 06:26:00 -0400 Researchers uncover why typically normal protein drives prostate cancer
咖啡和茶可以降低高血压患者患痴呆症的风险最近的研究表明，咖啡和茶可以预防高血压患者患痴呆症，特定的消费模式与降低风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Coffee-and-tea-may-lower-dementia-risk-in-hypertentials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Coffee-and-tea-may-lower-dementia-risk-in-hypertensives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b411a7d-e165-4f63-90e9-426244ec2259 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 05:59:00 -0400 Coffee and tea may lower dementia risk in hypertensives
义翘神州与BioGeometry深化战略合作，以生成AI赋能蛋白质研发领先的重组蛋白生产公司义翘神州很高兴地宣布扩大与数字生物学先驱 BioGeometry 的战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Sino-Biological-and-BioGeometry-Deepen-Strategic-Cooperation-to-Empower-Protein-RD-with-Generative-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Sino-Biological-and-BioGeometry-Deepen-Strategic-Cooperation-to-Empower-Protein-RD-with-Generative-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2c57613-2056-47c2-bd9e-ce85ab870ce1 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 04:18:00 -0400 Sino Biological and BioGeometry Deepen Strategic Cooperation to Empower Protein R&D with Generative AI
